00038 class PropertyValue: public TypeReference
00039 {
00040     bool m_needed;
00041 public:
00049     template<typename T> PropertyValue( const T &ref, bool _needed = false ):
00050         TypeReference( new Type<T>( ref ) ), m_needed( _needed ) {
00051         check_type<T>();
00052     }
00053     template<typename T> PropertyValue( const Type<T>& ref, bool _needed = false ):
00054         TypeReference( new Type<T>( ref ) ), m_needed( _needed ) {
00055         check_type<T>();

00062     PropertyValue( bool _needed = false );

00067 
00076     bool operator ==( const PropertyValue &second )const;
00085     bool operator !=( const PropertyValue &second )const;
00094     bool operator ==( const _internal::TypeBase &second )const;
00108     template<typename T> bool operator ==( const T &second )const {
00109         check_type<T>();
00110 
00111         if ( get()->is<T>() ) { // If I'm of the same type as the comparator
00112             const T &cmp = get()->cast_to<T>();
00113             return second == cmp; //compare our values
00114         } else if ( ! empty() ) { // otherwise try to make me T and compare that
00115             LOG( Debug, info )
00116                     << *this << " is not " << Type<T>::staticName() << " trying to convert.";
00117             TypeReference dst = ( *this )->copyToNewById( Type<T>::staticID );
00118 
00119             if ( !dst.empty() )
00120                 return dst->cast_to<T>() == second;
00121         }
00122 
00123         return false;
00124     }
00125 };
